summary: an awesome git plugin for vim.
name: hypergit.vim
description:
* hypergit plugin provides a tree menu just like NERD_Tree, you can execute
git command very easily. you can expand, collpase, execute on each node.

* it also provides a bunch of commands and key mapping, 

* support editing of `git rebase -i [branch]`

* status buffer to edit/commit/delete/add files.

Please see:  http://github.com/c9s/hypergit.vim
install_details:
just run make:

   $ make install

http://github.com/c9s/hypergit.vim
